title: Teachers and pupils talking
creator_credit: Open University, British Broadcasting Corporation and David Seligman
brief_description: Examines the potential conflict between the teacher’s effort to control the shaping of knowledge in the classroom and the pupils’ attempts to join the shaping. Several of the strategies adopted by the teacher are noted.
